headline.description: Human readable label that will be printed along the component.

RadioButton.description: A group of values where only one can be selected.

radioButtons.description: Individual values that can be selected.

checked.description: If true, this value will be selected by default.

TagSelect.description: A group of values where multiple can be selected.

tagSelects.description: Individual values that can be selected.

SelectDropdown.description: A group of values where only one can be selected and is rendered at a time.

item.description: An individual item that can be selected.

selectedOptions.description: Individual values that can be selected.

selectInputLabel.description: Human readable label for the component.

useIconOption.description: Can be enabled to show an icon beside individual options.

isSearchable.description: Allow the user to search for options by their label.

id.description: The unique identifier for the consulting type

tenantId.description: The unique identifier of the tenant that the consulting type belongs to.

groups.description: Group names - the same group names are combined in the consulting type structure

furtherInformation.description: Label and link for further information of the consulting type

slug.description: The unique slug for the consulting type

excludeNonMainConsultantsFromTeamSession.description: True, if only consultants with role main-consultant should be added to all team sessions

lockedAgencies.description: If true, no agency with this consulting type can be deleted or set offline via the admin api

whiteSpot.description: Behavior regarding the white spots agencies

whiteSpotAgencyAssigned.description: If true, agency with id in property 'whiteSpotAgencyId' will be proposed if no agency was found via given postcode in registration form

whiteSpotAgencyId.description: The id the of the white spot agency

isGroupChat.description: True, if group chats are provided for this consulting type

groupChatRules.description: Rules for the group chat which are displayed to the user

consultantBoundedToConsultingType.description: True, if a consultant may only be assigned to agencies with this consulting type

sendWelcomeMessage.description: Indicates whether if the system should send an automatic reply message to all enquiries for this consulting type or not

welcomeMessageText.description: The welcome message text for this consulting type -> null, if sendWelcomeMessage is false

sendFurtherStepsMessage.description: Indicates whether if the system should send an automatic further steps message to all enquiries for this consulting type or not

sendSaveSessionDataMessage.description: Indicates whether if the system should send an automatic message with a prompt for the user to enter optional information to the session

sessionDataInitializing.description: Settings to control which optional fields for consultation should be initialized for this consultation type.

addictiveDrugs.description: True, if the field addictiveDrugs should be initialized for this consulting type

age.description: True, if the field age should be initialized for this consulting type

gender.description: True, if the field gender should be initialized for this consulting type

relation.description: True, if the field relation should be initialized for this consulting type

state.description: True, if the field state should be initialized for this consulting type

initializeFeedbackChat.description: Indicates whether the feedback chat should be initialized for every session of this consulting type

isPeerChat.description: Indicates whether the chat should be initialized as peer chat for every session of this consulting type

languageFormal.description: Indicates whether the feedback chat should be initialized for every session of this consulting type

teamSessions.description: Special mail notification settings for team sessions

newMessage.description: Special mail notification settings for new messages

allTeamConsultants.description: If true, all consultants will be informed by email

minPostcodeSize.description: The minimum number of digits for the postal code that must be entered during registration.

autoSelectAgency.description: For consulting types to which only one agency is assigned: if true the assigned agency is automatically selected

autoSelectPostcode.description: If true postcode is automatically taken over from agency in the registration form

notes.description: Additional info to display in agency selection and password accordion (optional)

agencySelection.description: Additional info to display in agency selection

password.description: Additional info to display in password accordion

mandatoryFields.description: Control of mandatory fields for registration

age.description: If true, this field is mandatory for the registration

state.description: If true, this field is mandatory for the registration

titles.description: Titles for this consulting type, which are displayed to the user

default.description: Title which is displayed in list items

short.description: Title which is displayed in the session header

long.description: Title which is displayed as overline and as title of the registration form

welcome.description: Welcome message which is displayed on the pre-registration page

registrationDropdown.description: Alternative title for the display of the topic for the registration dropdown in the advice seeker profile

requiredAidMissingRedirectUrl.description: If no `aid` query parameter (agency ID) is passed to the respective registration page as get parameter, the UI will redirect to this URL.

registrationPostcodeFallbackUrl.description: If no white spot agency provided for this consulting type a note is display with a link to this url, in case no matching agency for the given postcode was found

showAskerProfile.description: True to show asker profile for consultants. False, when asker profile should not be viewable.

isVideoCallAllowed.description: True to enable video call buttons for consultants. False, when video call should be deactivated for consulting type.

isSubsequentRegistrationAllowed.description: If true, askers additionally can register for this consulting type on their profile page at a later date.

isAnonymousConversationAllowed.description: Indicates whether anonymous 1:1 chats can be performed.

requiredComponents.description:: Can be provided if additional data is required for registration.

isEnabled.description: If this is true, the age selection will be displayed.

options.description: Individual values that can be selected.

label.description: Human readable label for the option.

state.description: Selection for the federal state of the asker.

isEnabled.description: If this is true, the state selection will be displayed.

welcomeScreen.description: Properties for registration welcome screen items
